channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- ArtPlacer Widget
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- ArtPlacer Widget

item.title: CVE-2023-6373|2024-01-16T15:57:47.717Z -- unknown -- artplacer%20widget
item.description: The ArtPlacer Widget WordPress plugin before 2.20.7 does not sanitize and escape the "id" parameter before submitting the query, leading to a SQLI exploitable by editors and above. Note: Due to the lack of CSRF check, the issue could also be exploited via a CSRF against a logged editor (or above)
